text: My mac just made a _really_ loud noise (it sounded like it came from a video game), but I have _no idea_ what application was responsible. Any way to find out / investigate this sort of thing?

elements.text: loud noise (it sounded like it came from a video game), but I have
what application was responsible. Any way to find out / investigate this sort of thing?

text:
check CPU percentage in top/htop
Mostly noises from computers are fans, which on a mac is almost certainly CPU
